Many mousses contain alcohol and other drying ingredients that can strip hair of its natural oils and moisture. This can lead to dry, brittle hair that is prone to breakage and damage.   • Avoid the roots - be sure to avoid applying mousse directly to your roots, as this can create buildup and clog hair follicles.
  • Blow-dry your hair - use a blow dryer to style your hair after applying mousse, and be sure to use a heat protectant spray to avoid damage.

  3. Evenly distribute the mousse throughout your hair, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends.
